sentence.Network_en: Genius only means hard - working all one's life. ( Mendeleyev, Russian chemist )
sentence.Network_cn: 天才只意味着终身不懈的努力. ( 俄国化学家门捷列夫 )

sentence.Network_en: According to Mendeleyev's periodic table, there seem to be still some elements undiscovered yet.
sentence.Network_cn: 按照门捷列夫周期表, 似乎还有一些元素尚未发现.

means.word_mean: 1. Russian chemist who developed a periodic table of the chemical elements and predicted the discovery of several new elements (1834-1907)
